name: Callygrafun for kids - learn & paint alphapet
name_original: Callygrafun for kids - learn & paint alphapet
description:
"Callygrafun" is an educational application created to practice writing anywhere, anytime.

Its most basic level helps train the basic paths that form the letters, through mini-games to push objects and draw strokes. While at the highest levels, you work on the upper and lower case letters.

And your self-assessment system rates the perfection of writing automatically.

Characteristics:

- More than 100 exercises.
- Practice writing in upper and lowercase letters.
- Exercises to practice strokes.
- Use of video game elements to enhance the fun.
- Easy and intuitive to use.
- System of evaluation of the tracing that qualifies the perfection of the writing.
